lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A shift of savings into long-term assets would dampen monetary expansion and foster a stable rise of the money supply, he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Karl-Herbert Schneider-Gaedicke, deputy management board chairman of DG Bank Deutsche Genossenschaftsbank, said German domestic and institutional investors had also shown reservations about investing in participation shares.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The liberalization of West German capital markets in May 1985 led to a flood of financial innovations but the lack of a secondary market for these has diminished their acceptance, Deutsche Girozentrale - Deutsche Kommunalbank management board member Wiegand Hennicke said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A shift of savings into long-term assets would dampen monetary expansion and foster a stable rise of the money supply, he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Karl-Herbert Schneider-Gaedicke, deputy management board chairman of DG Bank Deutsche Genossenschaftsbank, said German domestic and institutional investors had also shown reservations about investing in participation shares.

lst.name: sentence
